article.headline: Hofstra 82, Colgate 59
article.story: HEMPSTEAD, N.Y. -- Mike Moore scored 24 points and Dwan McMillan added a double-double to lead Hofstra over Colgate 82-59 on Thursday night. Moore was 4 of 8 from the 3-point line and 8 of 10 from the free-throw line in his ninth game with at least 20 points. McMillan had 13 rebounds and 10 assists, Shemiye McLendon added 17 points and David Imes and Nathaniel Lester chipped in 10 each for the Pride (5-7). Hofstra scored 20 points off 18 turnovers, and held Colgate without a fast-break point, as the Pride improved to 4-0 over the Raiders. Hofstra led 44-41 with 16:12 remaining and went on a 10-2 run. Lester's layup capped the spurt for a 54-43 lead with 12:37 to play. McLendon scored 15 of his points in the second half. Sterling Melville finished with 16 points and Nick Pascale had 13 points and 10 rebounds to lead Colgate (5-6).

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
